```{r setup}
library(details)
```

One the most basic and popular uses for `details` is to paste the sessioninfo at the bottom of a GitHub issue.

```{r,results='asis'}

sessioninfo::session_info()%>%
  details::details(
    summary = 'Current session info',
    open    = TRUE
  )

```
